chat_history.message: Hello, My iPhone 13 has the above problem: I ordered on May 30th, 2024. Now it's been about 7 days and I still haven't received anything. Therefore, I wanted to ask if/when my package will arrive. Thank you for your help,

Hello ecomobile,

We wanted to let you know Markus hasn’t received their order.

We’ve checked the tracking link, but there isn’t one.

Can you let us know if the order was shipped, and under which tracking number?
In case the order was not shipped yet, please ship it and provide a valid tracking number, or refund the order under 1 business day.

If the delivery starts moving again, a refund won’t be issued, and the order will be considered late.

Let us know if you have any questions or concerns — we’ll keep an eye out for your reply.

Thanks for your help,

Paulo, Back Market Customer Care

Dear Backcare,


We would like to apologize. The parcel appears to be stolen. We are conducting an internal investigation. In the meantime we have reimbursed the customer completely for this order. We are sorry for the inconvenience caused.

Regards,
CH

Dear ecomobile

Thank you for letting us know. The customer was informed and the case and SAV closed accordingly. Thank you for understanding.

Best Regards,

Paulo from the Back Care Team
